actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of the duty on methylene blue which is used as a process stabilizer in the manufacture of organic chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1990, the duty on 3,7-Bis (dimethylamino)-phenazathionium chloride (methylene blue).

titles.title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of the duty on methylene blue which is used as a process stabilizer in the manufacture of organic chemicals.
